Hi, I'm Chloe!

I am a Software Engineer at DoSomething.org, the largest organization for young people and social change.

I am interested in the intersection of technology and social good.

Prior to being a Software Engineer, I was on the Marketing Team at DoSomething.org for nearly four years.

In an effort to support women in tech, DoSomething.org sponsored my enrollment in the Flatiron School. Upon graduation in 2015 I returned as a Junior Engineer.
